stories.text:
Hey HN,

During the past year, my cousin and I acquired an abandoned side project, monetized it and eventually sold it for ~$20,000.

In the end, the project was generating around $700/mo and had 3000 registered users.

However, we were never able to truly find a scalable user acquisition channel so we ended up selling it recently.

Some of the lessons I learned include, not optimizing for AppSumo users, building trust with potential acquirers, and learning the value of building a strong acquisition channel.

If you want to hear more about the lessons I've summarized them in this article:

https://benjlin.medium.com/lessons-learned-from-selling-my-side-project-for-20-000-7b820b9e6422
stories.title: Lessons learned from selling my side project for $20k
